author: publisher15
title: Jammu and Kashmir Govt Jobs 2017 – Junior Project Fellow Posts

organizations.name: office of the regional wildlife warden
dept of wildlife protection kashmir vacancy details

text: Jammu and Kashmir Govt Jobs 2017 – Junior Project Fellow Posts Dept of Wildlife Protection Kashmir Jobs 2017 – Junior Project Fellow Posts: Government of Jammu and Kashmir, Department of Wildlife Protection has issued a notification for the recruitment of Junior Project Fellow vacancies for the project “Survey and census of wildlife to establish base line information in Overa Aru Wildlife sanctuary in J&K” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 10-02-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Dept of Wildlife Protection Kashmir Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Junior Project Fellow Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18-37 years. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess First class postgraduate in wildlife Science/ Environmental Sciences/ Zoology/ Forestry. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application in the prescribed format along with photocopies of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification should be sent by hand/ post to Office of the Regional Wildlife Warden, Department of Wildlife Protection, near Lalit grand hotel, Boulevard Srinagar – 190005 by or before 10-02-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 10-02-2017. For more details like selection procedure, emoluments, desirable qualification & other information click on the link given below….
